thread.title: Benefit Cosmetics blessed us mortals with their new Cheek Parade Blush Palette
thread.title_full: Benefit Cosmetics blessed us mortals with their new Cheek Parade Blush Palette

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: Benefit Cosmetics blessed us mortals with their new Cheek Parade Blush Palette

organizations.name: cheek parade blush palette benefit cosmetics
hoola / hoola lite / galifornia / dandelion blush / rockateur

text:
Benefit Cosmetics blessed us mortals with their new Cheek Parade Blush Palette We find ourselves consistently pleased when it comes to new makeup releases and additions to the Benefit Cosmetics collection of goodies. So when we first spotted the Benefit Cosmetics Cheek Parade Blush palette and realized it was only for sale in the UK, we felt a flutter of disappointment. Yes, for a limited time we could technically order it from House of Frazer and have it shipped across the ocean, but that window quickly closed and we were left weeping, blushless in the lurch.
Luckily for us, the weeping can now end because according to Trendmood’s Instagram the Cheek Parade Blush palette is now stateside. Unfortunately, and just as we imagined, the blush palette quickly sold out on Sephora’s website , but we’re crossing our fingers Benefit releases the palette on their site later this month! We’ll be keeping our eyes peeled on Ulta Beauty, too.
Even just hearing this news, we can feel the sun shining on our faces. This is a MUST! All in one Available NOW!!!! LINK ➡ BIO Online @Sephora #BEAUTIFUL Palette ✨ The #CheekParade by @benefitcosmetics A NEW #FacePalette ✨Which includes: Hoola / Hoola Lite / Galifornia / Dandelion Blush / Rockateur *Full size $58 #WhatASteal Did u get yours ? ✨ #Trendmood #benefitcosmetics #beauty #pink #pinkblush #makeupjunkie #makeuptalk #makeuplover #makeupaddict #bbloggers #bblogger #instabeauty #beauty #beautyaddict #cosmetics #beautyblog #beautycare #makeupart #makeupartist #makeupblogger #makeupobsessed #wakeupandmakeup #maquillaje #fashion pic: @beautezine THANK U for this AMAZING update: @mary.thefitmom.malone @amyfaithking @mrslanglam @jlovesmakeup089 @caitylawn @araceli0602 @yanmmeth @ingo84 
A post shared by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Mar 21, 2017 at 7:41am PDT 
The palette itself includes a Hoola Bronzer Lite, a dramatic Rockateur Blush, the bright pink (and new) Galifornia blush, the pastel Dandelion pink highlighter, and the original Hoola Bronzer. ¿Quieres hacerte YA con la paleta más deseada de @benefitspain? ¡Tú decides cuando empieza la preventa en sephora.es! Dale like ❤ a esta publicación y a la del pefil de @benefitspain y cuando lleguemos a 2000 likes en ambas empezamos la venta de #cheekparade 
A post shared by Sephora España (@sephora_spain) on Mar 21, 2017 at 4:43am PDT 
As you can see, the five glorious blush shades were already available in Spain. Now we can catch up.
This whole palette looks like a spring daydream coming to life. We just can't get enough of the NEW Cheek Parade Palette! Double tap if this is on your wish list gorgeous Get yours today exclusively from @houseoffraser for £49.50 #CheekParade #Benefit #Beauty 
A post shared by Benefit Cosmetics UK (@benefitcosmeticsuk) on Mar 18, 2017 at 1:11pm PDT 
If you’re feeling the Benefit blush vibe, but are not ready for the full palette, their ‘ 70s-inspired Galifornia blush is now available for individual sale on Sephora’s website for $29.
Con los primeros rayos de sol de la primavera... #sunbeam #galifornia #gimmebrow 
A post shared by Benefit Spain (@benefitspain) on Mar 21, 2017 at 1:59am PDT 
It appears that Benefit Cosmetics is not only set on making our faces blush but also our wallets.
